cs213.photoAlbum.guiview

Class GuiView

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs213.photoAlbum.guiview.GuiView

  • public class GuiView
extends java.lang.Object
    GuiView Class Handles the initial state switching of the photo album. It is the main class of the photo album that starts the GUI. It also handles the storage of user pictures as a list of PicturePanel instances.
    Author:
    Nadiia Chepurko
    See Also:
    PicturePanel

    • Method Detail

      • addPicture

        public void addPicture(Photo m)
        Adds a PicturePanel instance to the list of user pictures. The Pictures are stored and can be retrieved at any time to be displayed to the user.
        Parameters:
        m - the Photo instance for which the PicturePanel will be created.

      • removePicture

        public void removePicture(Photo m)
        Removes a given picture from the list of user PicturePanels.
        Parameters:
        m - the photo instance that the PicturePanel will be removed.

      • findPicturePanel

        public PicturePanel findPicturePanel(Photo m)
        This method finds a PicturePanel instance that corresponds to a Photo instance.
        Parameters:
        m - photo instance to be used for searching the PicturePanel list.
        Returns:
        the corresponding PicturePanel or null if no match is found.

      • listAlbums

        public java.util.List<Album> listAlbums()
        This method lists all user albums.
        Returns:
        The list of user albums.
